message.content:
We can work through the solution step‐by‐step.

Step 1. Free Cash Flow (FCF)
• In our example the FCF is obtained by adding the net cash flows from operating activities and investing activities.
• From the cash‐flow statement:
  Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –7,724,112.71  
  Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities = –480,116.37  
• FCF = –7,724,112.71 + (–480,116.37) = –8,204,229.08

Step 2. Return on Assets (ROA)
• ROA is normally computed as Net Profit divided by average Total Assets.
• From the income statement, Net Profit = –1,352,379.63
• From the balance sheet, beginning Total Assets = 13,000,000.00 and ending Total Assets = 12,385,382.42
  Average Total Assets = (13,000,000.00 + 12,385,382.42) / 2 = 12,692,691.21
• ROA = (–1,352,379.63 / 12,692,691.21) × 100 = –10.65%

Step 3. Return on Equity (ROE)
• ROE = Net Profit divided by average Owner’s Equity.
• Net Profit = –1,352,379.63  
• From the balance sheet, beginning Owner’s Equity = Paid-in Capital = 13,000,000.00  
  Ending Owner’s Equity = 11,647,620.37  
  Average Owner’s Equity = (13,000,000.00 + 11,647,620.37) / 2 = 12,323,810.19
• ROE = (–1,352,379.63 / 12,323,810.19) × 100 ≈ –10.97%

Step 4. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio
• This ratio is calculated by dividing the net cash flow from operating activities by the net income (using absolute values when both are negative).
• = (–7,724,112.71 / –1,352,379.63) ≈ 5.71

Step 5. Net Profit Margin
• This is defined as Net Profit divided by Total Revenue.
• From the income statement, Total Revenue = 5,755,241.17 and Net Profit = –1,352,379.63
• Net Profit Margin = (–1,352,379.63 / 5,755,241.17) × 100 ≈ –23.50%

Step 6. Gross Profit Margin
• This is computed as Gross Profit divided by Total Revenue.
• Gross Profit = 1,075,241.17 and Total Revenue = 5,755,241.17
• Gross Profit Margin = (1,075,241.17 / 5,755,241.17) × 100 ≈ 18.69%

Thus, the solution in the requested JSON format is:

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-8204229.08",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "-10.65%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "-10.97%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "5.71",
    "Net Profit Margin": "-23.50%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "18.69%"
  }
}
